title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Floerns Women's Rainbow Striped Print Button Front Long Sleeve Cardigan Sweater

reviews.customers_say: Customers like the cardigan's bright colors and find it looks amazing. The sweater is soft, comfortable, and lightweight, with a super soft fit that customers appreciate. The quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it good while others describe it as having a cheap weave. Several customers note that the size runs extremely large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright warm cardigan
items.body: My daughter loves it, the colors are bright and feeling is warm, good quality, she uses it baggy and just looks amazing, she gets compliments wherever she goes, good price. Read more
items.author: Jessica A. Lapaix

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very colorful sweater
items.body: I'm 5'2" 160 lb and got the rainbow stripe size L. It's slightly loose, so it runs large. It's beautiful but lightweight and delicate, and the buttonholes aren't lined. Warning: Keep it away from cats! Read more
items.author: Cathy Hertz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Light Sweater
items.body: This is a great light sweater with the perfect tunic length. Size was as expected. I did have to secure the buttons a bit better but that is a miner thing. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Robbins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Perfect color and fit. Thinner than expected. Read more
items.author: Kendra Coffman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and bold
items.body: Soft, bright, attractive, and warm. Read more
items.author: mnm413

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I get compliments every time I wear this! It is so soft and nice fit for comfort. Read more
items.author: Kim Miller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs large
items.body: Cute and vibrant colors, runs EXTREMELY large. Size down a size, or two, than what you'd normally wear. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: I love this cardigan. It's thin but perfect for fall! I work in early education and it definitely brings a nice pop of color to my outfit! Read more
items.author: Jessica E

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Multi, Khaki and Yellow, Pink, Blue Multi, Blue and White, Multi. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
